name: Sync Typeform leads to Google Sheets for randomized location-based sales rep assignment
description:
Streamline your lead management process by automatically syncing new Typeform leads to Google Sheets. This template enhances distribution fairness by randomly assigning each lead to a sales representative based on their geographic location. Ideal for teams with multiple reps per region, it ensures an equitable workload distribution and maximizes conversion opportunities by promptly engaging leads with the right local expertise.
Easily integrate Typeform to Google Sheets to capture leads, find the team of reps in the lead's location, and randomly assign a rep to the lead boosting your lead distribution system.
